::: {.cell}

The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: F2.5.web.mix v1.0.


> Location of natural ephemeral freshwater lakes was taken from global lake databases (Lehner and DÃ¶ll 2004; types 1 an 3 from Messager et al. 2016), excluding those from endorheic basins cf. F2.7 (Linke et al. 2019), and intersected with estimates of ephemeral surface water (classes 9 and 10 from Pekel et al. 2016). Occurrences were aggregated to 10 minutes spatial resolution..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))
 - GitHub repository ([GeoJSON / TopoJSON versions in GitHUB](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/F2.5.web.mix_v1.0_topo.json))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090951))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**F2.5 Ephemeral freshwater lakes**](/efg-info/F2_5.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Web navigation (**code: F2.5.web.mix**, version v1.0) 
 - Indicative Map (**code: F2.5.IM.mix**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

F2.5.web.mix (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F2.5.web.mix_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090951) :: [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/F2.5.web.mix_v1.0_topo.json) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/)
F2.5.IM.mix (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F2.5.IM.mix_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
